page.title: 18Employment
page.content: The Felixstowe Dock has the largest work-force in the district, including dockers, lorry-drivers, Customs Officials, Shipping Line personnel, Dock Security (they have their own Police Force) and all the Office workers and cleaners for the Dock Company itself, apart from those working for the individual forwarding companies and all the associated repair and maintenance needed. Sangamo's employ a considerable number of people. Not all of these workers live locally by any means. Many travel into the area daily from Ipswich and beyond while many local people travel just as far to their place of work. Compared to other parts of Suffolk there is a lower level of unemployment and several families have moved here to find work.
